item.title: Upstanding Movement
item.text: The first ape-similar-creatures get the ability to walk on their feet.

item.title: First Human Being
item.text: Belonging to bone remains, the first human beings, Homo Erectus, lived on earth at this time.

item.title: Homo Neanderthalensis
item.text: Belonging to bone remains, Homo Neanderthalensis, lived on earth at this time.

item.title: Movement To Iran
item.text: People started to move from the center of Africa towards the contemporary Iran.

item.title: Movement To China
item.text: People started to move from the center of Africa towards the contemporary China.

item.title: Movement To Australia
item.text: People started to move from the center of Africa towards the contemporary Australia.

item.title: Movement To Spain
item.text: People started to move from the center of Africa towards the contemporary Spain.

item.title: Homo Sapiens
item.text: Belonging to bone remains, Homo Sapiens (Sapiens), the final human being stated his reign on earth.

item.title: Movement To Russia
item.text: People started to move from the center of Africa towards the contemporary Russia.
